QuestData.Title: Desperate Acts
QuestData.Description: The Cult of the Damned maintains a small camp to the east, Malicia Outpost, which they use for field training outside of the Scholomance. We may have allowed them to proceed unchecked with this training for too long.$b$bIf cultists are truly using this plague to inoculate the wildlife, then Malicia Outpost must be where the inoculation is occurring.$b$bInstructor Malicia runs the outpost. Find her, slay her, and find out who she's taking orders from.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She claims to be training cultists in the field, but I have other suspicions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Instructor Malicia and obtain her Cult Orders.
QuestData.CompletionText: You take a look at the paperwork Malicia was carrying...
QuestData.RewardText: The orders in Malicia's possession incriminate Darkmaster Gandling of the Scholomance, but they also conceal another important bit of information.
